meanings.definition: Excessively generous or extravagant in giving or spending.
meanings.sent1: She was overlavish with her compliments, always praising everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The overlavish decorations at the party made it feel like a royal celebration.
meanings.sent3: He was so overlavish with the glitter that the entire room sparkled like a disco ball.
meanings.sent4: Her overlavish use of emojis in every text message made her friends smile.
meanings.sent5: The overlavish buffet at the event left everyone feeling satisfied and happy.

meanings.definition: To give or spend in an excessive or extravagant manner.
meanings.sent1: They tend to overlavish their pets with treats and toys.
meanings.sent2: She would overlavish her friends with gifts on their birthdays.
meanings.sent3: The magician overlavished the audience with an endless supply of colorful scarves.
meanings.sent4: The artist overlavished the canvas with vibrant strokes of paint.
meanings.sent5: The chef overlavished the dish with exotic spices, creating a unique flavor.
